fields.description:
No Alpha navigation on the right side when the ListView is 1st loaded

Alpha navigation displays on only after you click on the SearchView and click Cancel.

You can get more info at this url : 
http://developer.appcelerator.com/question/179628/searchbar-and-listview-sectionindextitles

I have also attached the code.
